title: Save the nuke Scientists - Iranian video game
description:
This is a video game created by an Iranian student group. The games official name is &#039;Special Operation&#039;.

The graphics are poor... and after playing it for about 5 minutes, I got bored. But it was fun in the beginning. It was the first Iranian made game that I had played.

The game requires &#039;at least&#039; a pentium3/Athlon 1.2ghz, 64mb graphic card and 500mb space along with 512mb ram.

The game has no crack file and no viruses.
